channel.title: Files on IntangibleMatter
channel.description: Recent content in Files on IntangibleMatter

item.title: The Beginner's Guide to File Management
item.description: So, it has come to my attention as of late that most people my age and younger were never taught how to properly organize their files. As someone born in 2006, I grew up on Windows XP, so I was forced to learn how to organize files, or else my entire computer would be a mess. I got more training later through my life thanks to my dad’s (who I called ‘Lala’) excellent file organization, and the face that in order to be effective in game development you need an effective folder structure.
